body_html: @dylanthomas The GPU arch for the card Titan V is Volta. I didn't compile the CUDA code for Volta in the conda package. You may have to compile from source with the help of this repo by yourself. If you don't want to compile, then you can use cuda80 packages which should work fine.
body_text: @dylanthomas The GPU arch for the card Titan V is Volta. I didn't compile the CUDA code for Volta in the conda package. You may have to compile from source with the help of this repo by yourself. If you don't want to compile, then you can use cuda80 packages which should work fine.
body: @dylanthomas The GPU arch for the card __Titan V__ is Volta. I didn't compile the CUDA code for Volta in the conda package. You may have to compile from source with the help of this [repo](https://github.com/peterjc123/pytorch-scripts) by yourself. If you don't want to compile, then you can use cuda80 packages which should work fine.
